# p-spinner



<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property | Attribute | Description                                      | Type                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                | Default   |
| -------- | --------- | ------------------------------------------------ | ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | --------- |
| `size`   | `size`    | Size of the spinner.                             | `string \| { base?: "small" \| "medium" \| "large" \| "inherit"; xs?: "small" \| "medium" \| "large" \| "inherit"; s?: "small" \| "medium" \| "large" \| "inherit"; m?: "small" \| "medium" \| "large" \| "inherit"; l?: "small" \| "medium" \| "large" \| "inherit"; xl?: "small" \| "medium" \| "large" \| "inherit"; } & { base: "small" \| "medium" \| "large" \| "inherit"; }` | `'small'` |
| `theme`  | `theme`   | Adapts the spinner color depending on the theme. | `"dark" \| "light"`                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 | `'light'` |
